sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Card, Row, Form, Typography } from 'antd'
// import ExistingData from './ExistingData'
import FileUploadForm from './FileUploadForm'
import FormOptions from './FormOptions'
import { StyledNavButton } from 'constants/StyledComponents'
import { CloudUploadOutlined, ToTopOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'

const { Title } = Typography

function OpsAdmin() {
    
    const [ visible, setVisible ] = useState(0)

    return (
        <Card>
            <Card>
                <Form>
                    <Form.Item justify="center" style={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '1.5%' }}>
                        <Title level={1}>Upload Transactions</Title>
                    </Form.Item>
                    <Row style={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '2%'}}>
                        <StyledNavButton style={{ marginRight: '1.5%'}} onClick={ () => setVisible(1) }><ToTopOutlined style={{ marginRight: '4%' }} />Add a single transaction</StyledNavButton>
                        <StyledNavButton style={{ marginLeft: '1.5%'}} onClick={ () => setVisible(2) }><CloudUploadOutlined style={{ marginRight: '4%' }} />Upload an entire file</StyledNavButton>
                    </Row>
                    { visible === 1 ? <FormOptions /> : visible === 2 ? <FileUploadForm /> : '' }
                </Form>
            </Card>
        </Card>
    )
}

export default OpsAdmin
